title: Episode 109: Feat. TK Kirkland and Saniy'yah Samaa
itunes:title: Episode 109: Feat. TK Kirkland and Saniy'yah Samaa
description:
Comedian TK Kirkland and Stylist Saniy’yah Samaa from Basketball Wives Los Angeles sit with the ladies of Lip Service and discuss the complications of handling baby mothers/fathers. TK Kirkland opens up about the time he was offered a blowjob from another man in the bathroom while in grade school. Saniy’yah expresses her frustrations regarding how Basketball Wives portrayed her. Angela even goes into detail about an incredibly awkward story in which a man masturbated next to her while in a car.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
